name: Cave Racer (itch) (Jake Nguyen, RossyRoo, BlastLad, StronkTenk)
name_original: Cave Racer (itch) (Jake Nguyen, RossyRoo, BlastLad, StronkTenk)
description:
Race down this infinite cave! Avoid obstacles and run into power ups to get as far as you can!

CONTROLS:

  • A/D - Move Left or Right
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift + A/D - Barrel Roll Left or Right
  • Right Click - Shoot

CREDITS:

Sean O'Connor: Programmer

Robert Guan: Programmer and 3D Artist

Jake Nguyen: Programmer and 3D Artist

Ross Smith: Programmer
